price: (18) [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life?
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdan walabith'ta fīnā min ʿumurika sinīna
